explanation: Funds are required to fully fund the gross weapon system cost of T-AO 214 in FY 2024. The recently negotiated eight ship block buy contract resulted in a cost of $858.42 million, resulting in a $43.0 million shortfall. Of the $43.0 million, $36.4 million is required to restore funds temporarily realigned from change orders, electronics, and hull, mechanical, and electrical cost categories to support a higher basic construction award with the shipbuilder. budget_title: Impacts to schedules and program delays will be mitigated by re-phasing funding and not impacting
explanation: Funds are available based on under execution to date and/or deferral of equipment purchases ‘and less critical requirements. The Department’s intent is not to reduce the procurement of end items. Impacts to schedules and program delays will be mitigated by re-phasing funding and not impacting operational requirements in FY 2025/2026.
